xwikidoc.name: DataCollectorManagerAjax
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## -*- Mode:Velocity #if("$!request.getParameter('collector')" != "" && "$!request.getParameter('entityDoc')" != "") ## #set($dc = $!request.getParameter('collector')) #set($dn = $!request.getParameter('entityDoc')) #set($d = $xwiki.getDocument($dn)) ## #set($rmobj = '') #foreach($obj in $d.getObjects('RISCOSSPlatformDataCollectorCode.DataCollectorScheduler')) #if("$!obj.getProperty('collectorName').getValue()" == $dc) #set($schedule = $obj) #end #end #set($collector = $d.getObject($dc)) ## #if ($!request.getParameter('action') == "remove") #if("$!rmobj" == "" || !$d.removeObject($rmobj)) NO_SUCH_SCHEDULE #end #if("$!rmobj" == "" || !$d.removeObject($rmobj)) NO_SUCH_COLLECTOR #end $d.save("Removed DataCollector ${dc}") #elseif ($!request.getParameter('action') == "rerun") $schedule.set('timeLastRun', '') $d.save("$xcontext.getUser() re-ran DataCollector ${dc}") OK #end ## #else {{info}}This document contains code to manipulate data collectors.{{/info}} #end {{/velocity}}
